official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress on a transmittal concerning treatment of contributions from relatives to medicaid applicants or recipients.
subjects: Department of Health and Human Services

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress that the Department of Health and Human Services withdraw the transmittal entitled "Treatment of Contributions From Relatives to Medicaid Applicants or Recipients."

titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress on a transmittal concerning treatment of contributions from relatives to medicaid applicants or recipients.
